name: 洪榮勳
objective: 為應因八十七年之放流水標準,廢水處理必將進入高級處理之階段.在本課程中將深入探討混凝與膠凝,沈凝,氨氣提,過慮,吸附,薄膜處理,離子交換等各單元,並說明如何應用於廢水處理.
schedule:
1. General Description of Wastewater Engineering
2. Wastewater Flow Rates and Constituent Loadings
3. Process Analysis and Selection
4. Physical Unit Operations
5. Chemical Unit Processes
6. Advanced Physical and Chemical Treatment; Quiz
materials:
METCALF and EDDY , Wastewater Engineering Treatment and Reuse , The McGraw-Hill Companies
Other material will be distributed in the class
